info.report-description: LTE MAC measurement (M8029) measures MAC related indicators per cell. This includes at present e.g. timing advance measurements (cf. LTE1697) or potentially later on comparable measurements (cf 32.425, 4.10.2) or RACH measurements (cf. 32.425, 4.5.5) For MCC/MNC primary PLMN-Id shall be used.

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX (M8029C0)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the index of the Timing Advance set that has been configured as expected maximum cell size. Its value determines the set for the TA values collection. UPDATED: This counter is set at the end of the measurement period with the value of the parameter "LNCEL-expectedCellSize".

kpi_info.title: TIMING_ADV_BIN_1 (M8029C1)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the total time of UEs (in seconds) that are in the range d (in m) from the antenna depending on the value i of the counter TIMING_ADV_SET_INDEX: i = 1: 0 <= d < 78 i = 2: 0 <= d < 468 i = 3: 0 <= d < 1,006 i = 4: 0 <= d < 1,505 i = 5: 0 <= d < 3,003 i = 6: 0 <= d < 6,006 i = 7: 0 <= d < 10,000 UPDATED: The counter is updated on the following events: 1. on random access response it is incremented by 1 2. on TA command by the time difference (in seconds) to the last counter update (either initial TA or TA command) for a UE, which was in the counter's range d

kpi_info.title: RACH_MSG3_UL_DATA_NON_SYNC (M8029C31)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of messages, which are sent by the UE as a part of the RACH procedure (so-called 'msg3') in case the UE wants to send data but its UL synchronization status is 'non-synchronized' (cf. 3GPP TS 36.300, 10.1.5). UPDATED: The counter is updated when the eNB receives the msg3 in case of a contention-based RACH procedure for UL data arrival.

kpi_info.title: RACH_MSG3_CONTENTION (M8029C32)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of messages, which are sent by the UE as part of the RACH procedure (so-called "msg3") in any kind of contention-based RACH procedure (consult 3GPP TS 36.300, 10.1.5). UPDATED: The counter is updated when the eNB receives the msg3 in case of any kind of contention-based RACH procedure.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
